```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(Biostrings)
library(pheatmap)
```

```{r}
dna_sequences <- DNAStringSet(c("AGCTGATCGAGCGCCATCG", "AGCTGATCGAGCTGGCTTGCCATCG", "AGCTGATCGAGTCGACTTGCCATCG"))
reference <- DNAStringSet(c("AGCTGATCGAGCTTGCCATCG"))
psa <- pwalign::pairwiseAlignment(pattern = dna_sequences, subject = reference,
gapOpening = 0, gapExtension = -1)
psa 
```

```{r}
plot_single_subject_alignments(psa, view_indels=FALSE)
```


```{r}
plot_single_subject_alignments(psa, view_indels=TRUE)
```
